metadata.style: Cozy hand-drawn art, warm colors, inviting atmosphere

backgrounds.prompt: A cozy, hand-drawn lush forest landscape with tall trees, soft green foliage, dappled sunlight filtering through leaves, peaceful atmosphere, warm and inviting colors, mobile game background art, top-down isometric perspective, slight crash site visible with pieces of spaceship

A hand-drawn arid desert landscape with golden sand dunes, scattered cacti, warm sunset colors, peaceful yet harsh environment, cozy art style despite the desert heat, mobile game background, top-down isometric view, subtle oil patches visible

characters.name: Red Panda - Idle
characters.prompt: An adorable, highly intelligent red panda character with bright orange-red fur, expressive curious eyes, wearing a tiny engineer's vest with pockets, standing in idle pose, cozy hand-drawn style, cute but not overly cartoonish, mobile game sprite

characters.name: Red Panda - Working
characters.prompt: The same intelligent red panda character actively working on machinery, holding a small wrench or tool, focused expression, engineer vest, hand-drawn cozy style, energetic pose showing problem-solving

characters.name: Red Panda - Expedition
characters.prompt: The intelligent red panda character equipped for exploration, wearing a small backpack and explorer's hat, determined expression, holding a map, hand-drawn cozy style, ready for adventure

automations.prompt: Icon for a harvester automation machine, simple mechanical design with gears and collection basket, hand-drawn cozy style, warm colors, 64x64 game icon, circular or rounded square frame
Icon for a wood chipper machine, showing wood being processed, mechanical but friendly design, hand-drawn cozy style, warm browns and greens, 64x64 game icon
Icon for a saw mill building, showing circular saw blade and wood planks, cozy industrial design, hand-drawn style, warm wooden colors, 64x64 game icon
Icon for a stone crusher machine, heavy mechanical design crushing rocks, hand-drawn cozy style, gray and metallic colors with warm accents, 64x64 game icon
Icon for a berry press machine, showing berries being pressed into juice, colorful and cheerful design, hand-drawn cozy style, purple and pink berry colors, 64x64 game icon
Icon for a sand collector machine, desert-themed with sifting mechanism, hand-drawn cozy style, sandy yellow and brown colors, 64x64 game icon
Icon for an oil pump machine, mechanical pump extracting black oil, industrial but cozy design, hand-drawn style, dark brown and metallic colors, 64x64 game icon
Icon for a glass furnace, showing molten sand and glass production, glowing warm colors, hand-drawn cozy style, orange glow and transparent glass, 64x64 game icon
Icon for an oil refinery, complex pipes and processing towers, industrial but friendly design, hand-drawn cozy style, metallic and dark colors, 64x64 game icon
Icon for a cacti farm, showing organized rows of cacti being cultivated, desert agriculture theme, hand-drawn cozy style, green and sandy colors, 64x64 game icon

resources.prompt: Resource icon for wood logs, simple hand-drawn style, warm brown colors, cozy appearance, 48x48 game icon
Resource icon for stone rocks, simple hand-drawn style, gray colors with texture, cozy appearance, 48x48 game icon
Resource icon for berries, colorful purple-blue berries, simple hand-drawn style, appetizing and cozy, 48x48 game icon
Resource icon for wooden planks, neatly stacked processed wood, hand-drawn style, warm wooden brown, 48x48 game icon
Resource icon for desert sand, fine golden particles, simple hand-drawn style, warm sandy yellow, 48x48 game icon
Resource icon for crude oil, dark liquid in a container, simple hand-drawn style, black and brown colors, 48x48 game icon
Resource icon for glass, transparent with slight shimmer, simple hand-drawn style, light blue-white with highlights, 48x48 game icon

powerCells.prompt: Icon for a basic power cell battery, simple cylindrical design with blue glow, hand-drawn cozy style, technological but friendly, 48x48 game icon
Icon for an advanced power cell, more complex design with green glow, hand-drawn cozy style, higher tech appearance, 48x48 game icon
Icon for a superior power cell, sleek design with purple glow and energy arcs, hand-drawn cozy style, premium appearance, 48x48 game icon
Icon for an unstable power cell, crackling with red and orange energy, warning symbols, hand-drawn cozy but dangerous style, volatile appearance, 48x48 game icon

ui.prompt: Hand-drawn cozy button design, warm colors, rounded corners, friendly appearance, suitable for mobile game UI
Hand-drawn panel background with subtle texture, warm neutral colors, cozy appearance, mobile game UI element
Hand-drawn exploration map icon, vintage style with warm parchment colors, cozy and inviting, mobile game UI
